articles.author: Sandee LaMotte
articles.title: Many Americans wrongly believe exposure to marijuana smoke is safer than tobacco, study finds - CNN
articles.description: A survey of American adults found that many erroneously believe it is safer for the lungs to smoke weed than tobacco, and that any secondhand smoke from marijuana is also safer.
articles.content: Is inhaling marijuana smoke safer than inhaling smoke from tobacco? A majority of American adults say yes, according to a new survey, and they also believe there is less harm to adults and children f… [+5906 chars]
